body:
I can't start minecraft for some reason, it keeps crashing. If I enable JVM arguments, it won't start, if I disable it, minecraft will start, but its graphics will be screwed. D:
please help!

Launcher log:http://pastebin.com/iFSvVWB0
Crash Report:http://pastebin.com/dj5k4qzT

title: Launcher Help!

replies.body:
You have XP? >.< 
On topic: Dont know how to help you there... never happend to me.. BUT:

Set the RAM to 1 GB and JVM arguments off... Hmm so u dont have Java 64bit.. Install Java64 and it should be good :)

replies.body: @vsplek i cant play w/o JVM arguments D: i need forcenostroke argument
